name: The Masked Man
description:
Short action platformer for the Github Game off 2019 game jam.

The game contains a tutorial. Joypads can be used, and its recommended.

Credits:

- Nightmare font from  EEve. Follow at @somepx

- Sound design using samples from GDC's audio library.

- Art, Music, Sound Design, Code and Game Design by Erick Quijivix. Follow at @Quijipixel.
